title: Unfair Leaver Buster Bans
body: If any of you summoners are like me, it must really make you sad when your power cuts or your net goes away during one of your rank matches and  when you finally get it up and running, you realize that you got five 20 minutes bans and you are placed in low priority ques. But nothing hurts more like when it is a client bug that causes the problem and you still have to endure the unbearable penalty. After the patch of 7.12, I was playing my rank match and the client bugged out and i was unable to log in. That forced my team to do a remake and i received negative LP for it.  After 2 more rank games later, I was in my third match when at 30 minutes in, I was disconnected. Thinking to myself to try and re log in, i encounter this message "We're unable to log you in because you may be offline"... With my net working perfectly fine and all. Just to realize that there was a problem that happened after the patch, finally finding a forum to fix the problem i was able to rejoin my match. When the match ended i was greeted a leaver buster penalty. I find this action to be very tedious and quite honestly unfair for me to suffer... Riot, please fix! {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: If you're impacted by the offline issue currently going on with a leaverbuster, we can take a look.  Hit us up individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll work with you individually to see if we can work something out.  No guarantees but it's a crappy experience that you went through.  See you there!
